text: near the small town of Cuero Texas dr.
Phylis Canion has witnessed a whirring
series of killings on our ranch in 2005
something strange attacked her chickens
drinking their blood what was the most
unusual is that each time we found a
chicken dead it was opened up anywhere
in this throat area and it appeared that
all the blood was out of it I actually
lost 28 all of them killed over months
in the exact same fashion I just did not
know what it was dr. Canyon is a
wildlife expert and has lived all their
life on a ranch she instantly knows this
is not the work of a normal Texas
predator
I had told all the neighbors you know if
you ever see this animal call me and let
me know because I want to see it don't
want to shoot it we just really want to
find out what it is
but it isn't a neighbor who gets first
sight of this new predator it's 2008 and
police officer Brandon riddle and his
partner are on a routine patrol we come
down here we turn a corner in a certain
we turn this corner looking for the down
fence we see something over here
just standing in middle road and just
didn't know what it was my partner tom
the lucky that was trained she just you
know oh my god what is it what is it
officer riddle turns on his dashboard
camera and captures the first images
ever of the strange creature
we're just Center Washington just run
run run and it was just a strange thing
he looks up and looks back at us the
creature has an unusually large muzzle
large protruding canine teeth and bright
blue eyes starting to come up this hill
here and then just takes off and then
came back up and it ran up the road
there's a strange it's just
weird-looking
I patrolled these back roads here in
DeWitt County for about eight half years
and that's the first time I ever seen
anything that looked like that
officer riddle films the creature only
25 miles from doctor canyons ranch every
time someone has some identified animal
the post-mortem analysis of it has
proven to be it's a mangy coyote or
sometimes a mangy fox but dr. Canyon is
convinced she has a new species stuffed
and just waiting for science to catch up
this is the animal it's bizarre we've
been all over the world and seen animals
from all over the world never seen
anything like this you know it doesn't
have any hair on it but the whole body
is covered with this slight layer of
fuzz and they saved it there you know
there's no such thing it doesn't exist
and it's right here
